column2: Oh, I love this one! The Passage is also part of the Terminal 2 Network, and you can launch it through the Clubhouse or the Desktop.
I think this game might have been made by a friend of Ada's. The main character looks a lot like her, and it doesn't hurt that I totally dig her style, too.
Uh-oh! Looks like The Passage isn't installed! We need it installed before you can play the quest. Would you like me to install it for you?
Use code blocks and platforming to navigate a strange and hostile alien planet.
